items.title: Minneapolis DA will not pursue criminal charges against suspected Tesla vandal
items.description: The Minneapolis district attorney will not pursue criminal charges against a Minnesota state employee accused of vandalizing at least six Teslas.

items.title: 'Evil is being defeated,' Marjorie Taylor Greene says of pope's death
items.description: Following the death of Pope Francis, Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene suggested on Monday that global power dynamics were shifting under divine influence.
